data.name: Plunge The Plumber
data.detailed_description:
Where did this All begin? He was made from a secret Portal from the Gassy Cosmos. Our Hero begins his adventure with the one goal of saving this newly built model community in a rural area but trouble halts the project! Can you help this become home for the future residents?

Abilities
***********
1. You have the power to climb using plunger stick technique and scale a bathroom like never before

2. Unlimited toilet paper? Yes! Aren't you so lucky!?

3. What hero wouldn't be complete without his trusty weapon. For you that one is easy the choice is simple! A plunger......... that's it a plunger enjoy!

Features
***********
1. Melee using your "Plunger Weapon" and shoot "Toilet Paper" from your hands.

2. Open environment to explore by traversing through Pipes.

3. Use a Controller or Mouse with Keyboard.
data.about_the_game:
Where did this All begin? He was made from a secret Portal from the Gassy Cosmos. Our Hero begins his adventure with the one goal of saving this newly built model community in a rural area but trouble halts the project! Can you help this become home for the future residents?

data.short_description: Is that a Plunger or a Robot? No! it's Plunge!!!!! The Hero we never knew we needed. He is the only one to save this impossible project and make the Community start to feel like Home. Who knew Plumbers were heroes?!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
